p: After formulations were dried, 10 μl of the conidia concentration of A. flavus (10 5) were placed in the center of the Petri plates and incubated at 20 °C until fungi reached its maximum development (7 days). Radial mycelial growth of the fungus was measured every day in 6 Petri dishes of each treatment with a Truper vernier caliper, during 7 days of incubation. Data were evaluated as the mycelial rate of growth, and percentage inhibition.
